It was two days after the end of their first year at University, and at Katie's insistence, the group had come together for one last party before they all went their separate ways for the summer vacation. With Jennifer's parents gone for the year on a world-wide vacation and having no siblings to interrupt them, they decided to take advantage and have a party in her family's old rec-room. Initially, the plan was to just get wasted and listen to some music, but Marla had brought something very interesting.

''We're playing this,'' Marla said, placing an old square box in the spot just opened. ''It's some kind of board-game Katie's Unc-, erm, I mean her Aunt gave us.''

''Her aunt? She don't have an aunt, I thought. You mean her uncle?'' Becca chimed in from infront of the large mirror in the corner. She was armed with a camera-phone in one hand and a beer bottle in the other, pressing it suggestively against her chest to get the best photo possible.

He tossed seven of them on the square labeled start before digging into the box for directions, only to find none.

''There's nothing here...'' He announced.

''You just let ME worry about that, players. Now please, take a seat, and let us begin the Sex Game!''

''Don't worry about that, my dear,'' the voice replied. ''You all seem confused, and I will be sure to answer your questions in a moment, but I think a demonstration is the best way for you to learn. Katie, as this is your game, you go first!''

''How did you know my name?''

''Katie,'' it began, ignoring her question, ''What is your biggest fetish?''

info.brief_description: 7 friends get trapped in a transformative game of sexual magic and fetish debauchery!
info.description:
Welcome to The Sex Game, a recreation of a recently deleted interactive. This story follows 8 friends from an unnamed University as they struggle to escape from a magical board-game that seeks to transform them in life-altering ways. The boards powers are limitless, and it can do things as far ranging as personality shifts, age changes, animal transformations, weight gain or loss, and frankly anything you could possible think of.

The goal of the game is to reach the final square before your opponents do by completing challenges set out by the game. Do as it wishes, and you can roll. Fail to do so and stay in your spot, or even worse, receive punishment if the player is acting truly bad. The winner is granted the right to transform the others how they wish; either back to normal, remain as they are, or anywhere in between.

Therefore, in regards to rules, there are none. Go wild!

Below are the characters:

Katie: A brown-haired white girl with fairly average proportions and a freckled, glasses-wearing face. Her personality is inquisitive; she is always willing to try anything once

Jennifer: A blonde white girl with a chubby, pear-shaped figure, though anyone who used those words around her would get a swift kick in the groin. Strong-willed and looks down on men to the point of misandry.

Caleb: A tall, sandy-haired boy who is thin and athletic but lacks the muscle to be truly called muscular. He is a rather passive man who portrays himself as cocky to hide his insecurity about never having had a girlfriend.

Jackie: A black girl with soft, curly hair. Her body is rather thick; unlike chubby Jennifer, she has an hourglass shape. She is the meekest member of the group and tries to avoid conflict whenever possible, even to her own detriment.

Cindy: A thin Asian girl with absolutely no curves to speak of and tattoo sleeves on both of her arms. She is a rebel, though not bitchy like Jennifer is.

Becca: Rebecca, or Becca as she likes to be called, is the older sister of Cindy and her polar opposite. Though once as thin as she was, Becca begged her rich parents for plastic surgery as graduation present. She now sports hefty fake tits and ass. She acts like a ditz, but in truth, is one of the smartest members of the group.

Marla: A black-haired white girl who is the tallest member of the group and thanks to her constant work-outs is also the strongest. Her participation in sports has given her both a calm demeanor and a competitive drive to win whenever she can.
